wikipedia_page.main: Daniel Mark Woodards (born 8 October 1983) is an English footballer who last played as a defender for National League club Boreham Wood. He previously played in the Football League for Crewe Alexandra, Milton Keynes Dons, Bristol Rovers and Tranmere Rovers.

response: Ibehre began the 2009–10 season on 15 August as a substitute for Danny Woodards in the Dons 0–0 draw with Swindon at the County Ground. He grabbed his first goal for the club in the following game on 18 August against Tranmere Rovers during a 1–0 win. Following this however, he made just 10 appearances between August and December, scoring once and making only three starts, and so was made available for loan.

Jones followed former teammate Danny Woodards to League One club Crewe Alexandra for £65,000 on a three-year deal. on 30 May 2007. Jones will become Crewe's second signing of the season from a non-league club.

Bailey made his full Crewe debut at right back at 19 years of age, when he came on as an 89th-minute substitute for Danny Woodards in a League One home fixture against Doncaster Rovers on 22 December 2007, with Crewe 2–0 down. Doncaster scored twice in the final minute for a final scoreline of 4–0. This proved to be Bailey's sole appearance of the 2007–08 season, but he earned a one-year deal with the club, which he signed in May 2008, with first team coach Steve Holland stating "We are delighted that James has signed a new contract. He has been given another year and we will review it again in relation to his progress. He has made progress this year and now it is up to him to go on again and compete for a place in the squad."

Ellis made his first league start on 12 January 2013 in a 3–0 victory against Fleetwood Town, setting up Danny Woodards to score the first goal after only five minutes of play."Fleetwood 3–0 Bristol Rovers" BBC Sport. 12 January 2013. Retrieved 15 February 2013. He scored his first goal for the club two weeks later on 26 January 2013, in a 3–1 victory away against Rotherham United at the New York Stadium."Rotherham 1–3 Bristol Rovers" BBC Sport. 26 January 2013. Retrieved 15 February 2013. He scored both goals in a 2–1 victory over Rochdale in March 2013."Bristol Rovers 2–1 Rochdale" BBC Sport. 16 March 2013. Retrieved 7 July 2015.
*  – Defender Danny Woodards joins Bristol Rovers signing a one-year deal.
